dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, July 09, 2005 12:37 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------

4.50) id 1DquVQ-0002aD-Hf for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Jul 2005
10:11:08 -0500

helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from

abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Jul 2005 10:11:08 -0500

lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 8 Jul 2005 15:11:04 -0000

4.50) id 1DquVK-0002ZY-VD for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Jul 2005
10:11:03 -0500

mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from lcappello@playboy.com) with esmtp
(Exim) id 1DquVG-0005Lv-3a for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Jul

[216.163.143.130]) by mx.la.playboy.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id EDFB788D0D

Message-ID:
<9A8EFDB8A197B8478D3FFE26E86C16DF015488A6@chexch.playboy.com>
X-MS-Has-Attach:         
X-MS-TNEF-Correlator:         
Thread-Topic:         DMCA - notice of copyright infringement

From:         Cappello, Laura <lcappello@playboy.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>

X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------

Cc:         Cashman, Ana <acashman@playboy.com>
Subject:         [ABUSE] DMCA - notice of copyright infringement

<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>

Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -97.1



July 8, 2005


_VIA E-MAIL

_

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Mr. Peter Pathos

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

abuse@theplanet.com


Dear Mr. Pathos:

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at http://echo.cx/
(69.93.224.2)

display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy
Enterprises International, Inc.

(?Playboy?).  All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs
to Playboy.

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on are not
authorized by the copyright owner,

its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images

on http://echo.cx/ (69.93.224.2) and on all web pages under your control.

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links:



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa16gb.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa22ph.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa32zb.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa44oi.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa54vi.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa64ei.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa78yy.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa80np.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa94up.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa103cg.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa114qi.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa126cs.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa145gf.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa152hk.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa174mw.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa185wq.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa192qd.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa209xm.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa135pw.jpg



http://img137.echo.cx/my.php?image=joannakrupa169rt.jpg





I, Laura Cappello, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf
of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned
unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images.  My contact
information

is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N. Lakeshore
Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,

Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is
lcappellol@playboy.com.

We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately.


This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights
and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise.  Any and
all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved.

PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.


Laura Cappello
Trademark Paralegal

cc:  Ana Cashman, Esq.
